Plot: Najib Amhali will play an Italian car salesman to impress the woman of his dreams, but he gets entangled in his own web of lies.
Title: Valentino
Writer: Daan Bakker (script editor), Éric Besnard (original screenplay), Nicolas Boukhrief (original screenplay), Don Duyns (additional dialogue), Marco van Geffen (adaptation), Marco van Geffen, Ernie Tee (script editor), Remy van Heugten (contributing writer)
Actors: Yolanthe Sneijder-Cabau, Derek de Lint, Elise Schaap, Johnny de Mol
